thread.title: GIANLUCA GENERALI
thread.title_full: World Wide Stereo reviewed by GIANLUCA GENERALI

author: GIANLUCA GENERALI
title: GIANLUCA GENERALI
text: I placed my first order (Teac UD-503) with World Wide Stereo with confidence (great referrals from friends), and immediately after I entered a chat with Customer Service (thank you Eric Cohen) to ask about shipment confirmation. I received immediate and helpful answers, and after few minutes I received the invoice by email, and also a shipment confirmation/tracking for 2-days shipment (I didn't even paid for). The item arrived right on time, and in perfect conditions. Did I say that the price was better than any other offer? Way to go guys, you have one more loyal customer! Thanks, having business with World Wide Stereo has been a pleasure for me.
